message: Let's start fair. I take the majority, you get a little something to start with. We can adjust later.
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not giving away too much just yet. Let's see what you're willing to offer in return.
I'm willing to compromise, but 70/30 feels a bit too lopsided. How about 80/20? It's a fairer split that still gives you a decent amount.
I'm not getting 20, but 40 is a decent compromise. You're still getting the majority, but I'm getting a bit more than last time. See if you can do better.
